document_data.name: The Watchspider Wizard
document_data.mainbody:
'''"The Watchspider Wizard"''' was the epithet given to an otherwise unnamed [[drow]] [[wizard]], active some time before the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

An angry priestess of [[Lolth]] once summoned a [[yochlol]] and sent it to kill him. To elude it, he used the ''[[wonderform]]'' spell to hide in the form of a [[wingless wonder]].
